gift_share_page_title: <referrer_name> have gifted you a <gift_offer> discount coupon
gift_share_page_description: The reward is automatically applied to this session. So you can purchase anything right now and the coupon will be applied automatically. But if you want to use this code later or on an another device, copy the code below

invalid_share_modal_description: The Gift coupon cannot be redeemed by the referrer itself
